# thoughtspot_role (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "thoughtspot_role" "this" {
  name        = "Role 1"
  description = "This is a role"
  privileges  = ["AUTHORING", "SHAREWITHALL"]
}
```

### Required

- `name` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)
- `privileges` (List of String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
